resources.name: Create User
resources.description:
User creation route, where the user's name, email and password must be informed in the specified fields.

```response:200
{
	"id": "6482ab15-d64a-4e65-8792-8802fac10953",
	"name": "Person 1",
	"email": "test01@gmail.com",
	"createdAt": "2022-01-20T05:31:37.558Z"
}
```

```response:400
{
	"status": "error",
	"message": "Email address already used"
}
```

resources.name: Hox Products API
resources.description: This API allows you to register users, authenticate them and manage products, being able to create, list, update and delete products from a database. There's only one environment variable in the project, which is baseUrl. The value of baseUrl for the selected environment is http://localhost:3333.

resources.name: List One User
resources.description:
Route that brings the result of a specific user that was searched for by id.

```response:200
{
	"id": "6482ab15-d64a-4e65-8792-8802fac10953",
	"name": "Person 1",
	"email": "test01@gmail.com",
	"createdAt": "2022-01-20T05:31:37.558Z"
}
```

resources.name: List All Users
Update User
resources.description:
Route where the user can change the name, email and password. The user must be authenticated and the id must be informed in the url.

```response:200
{
	"id": "6482ab15-d64a-4e65-8792-8802fac10953",
	"name": "Person 1",
	"email": "updatedtest@gmail.com",
	"createdAt": "2022-01-20T05:31:37.558Z"
}
```

```response:400
{
	"status": "error",
	"message": "Email address already used"
}
```

```response:401
{
	"status": "error",
	"message": "You must be authenticated for this"
}
```

resources.name: Delete User
resources.description:
Route to delete a user. The user must be authenticated and the id must be informed in the url.
If the user is successfully deleted, the message "No body returned for response" will appear with code 204.

```response:401
{
	"status": "error",
	"message": "You must be authenticated for this"
}
```

resources.name: Create Session (Authentication)
Create Product
resources.description:
Product creation route, where the product's name, price, whether it is perishable or not and manufacturing date must be informed in the specified fields. If the product is perishable, you must inform the expiration date.

The manufacturing date cannot be greater than or equal to the expiration date. 


```response:200
{
	"id": "b6031dca-b843-4d6b-bfed-f8b3f659cde9",
	"name": "Product 1",
	"perishable": true,
	"manufacturingDate": "10/11/2022",
	"expirationDate": "10/15/2022",
	"price": "R$Â 9,90"
}
```
```response:400
{
	"status": "error",
	"message": "The manufacturing date cannot be greater than or equal to the expiration date"
}
```
```response:400
{
	"status": "error",
	"message": "Expiration date is required"
}
```

resources.name: List One Product
resources.description:
Route that brings the result of a specific product that was searched for by id.

```response:200
{
	"id": "b6031dca-b843-4d6b-bfed-f8b3f659cde9",
	"name": "Product 1",
	"perishable": true,
	"manufacturingDate": "2022-10-11T03:00:00.000Z",
	"expirationDate": "2022-10-15T03:00:00.000Z",
	"price": "R$Â 9,90"
}
```

resources.name: List All Products
resources.description:
Route that returns all registered products, showing 10 products per page.

```response:200
[
	{
		"id": "b6031dca-b843-4d6b-bfed-f8b3f659cde9",
```

resources.name: Update Product
resources.description:
Route where the user can change the name, price, whether it is perishable or not, manufacturing date and expiration date. If a product was marked as perishable, when updated to non-perishable, the expiration date will be set to null.

```response:200
{
	"id": "b6031dca-b843-4d6b-bfed-f8b3f659cde9",
	"name": "Produto 2",
	"perishable": false,
	"manufacturingDate": "12/23/2022",
	"expirationDate": null,
	"price": "R$Â 7,90"
}
```

resources.name: Delete Product
resources.description:
Route to delete a product. The user must be authenticated and the id must be informed in the url.
If the product is successfully deleted, the message "No body returned for response" will appear with code 204.

```response:401
{
	"status": "error",
	"message": "You must be authenticated for this"
}
```
